label: 悪党
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: “evil band,” brigands, often so named by officials whose jurisdiction was being resisted. An early use is found in the eighth-century Shoku nihongi, but use of the term became more frequent in Heian times. [続日本紀]
